name: Filthy Hands VR
summary:
INTENSE MULTIPLAYER HOME INVASION GAMEPLAY
Filthy Hands VR throws you into a high-stakes home invasion scenario, where you can play as the lone intruder or the family of three trying to protect their home & safe. As the intruder, your goal is to steal a safe while avoiding or overpowering the family, who are armed with everyday household items turned weapons. Fight back with frying pans, baseball bats, BB guns, firecrackers, and much more, using creative tactics to gain the upper hand in this intense,...
